english: Based on the provided fiscal note for HB4519 regarding the Texas emissions reduction plan, there is insufficient information to determine any potential impacts on Chinese immigrants or other immigrant communities. The note only indicates there are no significant financial implications for Texas from the emissions reduction programs. Without access to the full bill text, we cannot assess whether there are any provisions that might affect immigrant populations.
chinese: 根据提供的HB4519号提案的财政说明，该提案涉及德克萨斯州减排计划，但仅包含财政影响评估，显示该计划对德克萨斯州不会产生重大财政影响。由于缺乏完整的法案文本，我们无法确定该法案是否包含任何可能影响中国移民或其他移民群体的条款。
